verses.t: This{H2088} is the book{H5612} of the generations{H8435} of Adam{H121}. In the day{H3117} that God{H430} created{H1254} man{H120}, in the likeness{H1823} of God{H430} made{H6213} he him;
Male{H2145} and female{H5347} created{H1254} he them; and blessed{H1288} them, and called{H7121} their name{H8034} Adam{H120}, in the day{H3117} when they were created{H1254}.
And Adam{H121} lived{H2421} an hundred{H3967} and thirty{H7970} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} a son in his own likeness{H1823}, after his image{H6754}; and called{H7121} his name{H8034} Seth{H8352}:
And the days{H3117} of Adam{H121} after{H310} he had begotten{H3205} Seth{H8352} were eight{H8083} hundred{H3967} years{H8141}: and he begat{H3205} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} that Adam{H121} lived{H2425} were nine{H8672} hundred{H8141} and thirty{H7970} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}.
And Seth{H8352} lived{H2421} an hundred{H8141} and five{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} Enos{H583}:Enos: Heb. Enosh
And Seth{H8352} lived{H2421} after{H310} he begat{H3205} Enos{H583} eight{H8083} hundred{H8141} and seven{H7651} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Seth{H8352} were nine{H8672} hundred{H8141} and twelve{H8147} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}.
And Enos{H583} lived{H2421} ninety{H8673} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} Cainan{H7018}:Cainan: Heb. Kenan
And Enos{H583} lived{H2421} after{H310} he begat{H3205} Cainan{H7018} eight{H8083} hundred{H8141} and fifteen{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Enos{H583} were nine{H8672} hundred{H8141} and five{H2568} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}.
And Cainan{H7018} lived{H2421} seventy{H7657} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} Mahalaleel{H4111}:Mahalaleel: Gr. Maleleel
And Cainan{H7018} lived{H2421} after{H310} he begat{H3205} Mahalaleel{H4111} eight{H8083} hundred{H8141} and forty{H705} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Cainan{H7018} were nine{H8672} hundred{H8141} and ten{H6235} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}.
And Mahalaleel{H4111} lived{H2421} sixty{H8141} and five{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} Jared{H3382}:Jared: Heb. Jered
And Mahalaleel{H4111} lived{H2421} after{H310} he begat{H3205} Jared{H3382} eight{H8083} hundred{H8141} and thirty{H7970} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Mahalaleel{H4111} were eight{H8083} hundred{H8141} ninety{H8673} and five{H2568} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}.
And Jared{H3382} lived{H2421} an hundred{H3967} sixty{H8141} and two{H8147} years{H8141}, and he begat{H3205} Enoch{H2585}:
And Jared{H3382} lived{H2421} after{H310} he begat{H3205} Enoch{H2585} eight{H8083} hundred{H3967} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Jared{H3382} were nine{H8672} hundred{H8141} sixty{H8346} and two{H8147} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}.
And Enoch{H2585} lived{H2421} sixty{H8346} and five{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} Methuselah{H4968}:Methuselah: Gr. Mathusala
And Enoch{H2585} walked{H1980} with{H854} God{H430} after{H310} he begat{H853} Methuselah{H4968}three{H7969} hundred{H3967} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Enoch{H2585} were three{H7969} hundred{H8141} sixty{H8346} and five{H2568} years{H8141}:
And Enoch{H2585} walked{H1980} with God{H430}: and he was not; for God{H430} took{H3947} him.
And Methuselah{H4968} lived{H2421} an hundred{H8141} eighty{H8084} and seven{H7651} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} Lamech{H3929}:

And Methuselah{H4968} lived{H2421} after{H310} he begat{H3205} Lamech{H3929} seven{H7651} hundred{H8141} eighty{H8084} and two{H8147} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:Lamech: Heb. Lemech
And all the days{H3117} of Methuselah{H4968} were nine{H8672} hundred{H8141} sixty{H8346} and nine{H8672} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}.
And Lamech{H3929} lived{H2421} an hundred{H8141} eighty{H8084} and two{H8147} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} a son{H1121}:

And he called{H7121} his name{H8034} Noah{H5146}, saying{H559}, This same shall comfort{H5162} us concerning our work{H4639} and toil{H6093} of our hands{H3027}, because{H4480} of the ground{H127} Lordwhich the {H3068} hath cursed{H779}.Noah: Gr. Noe: that is Rest, or, Comfort
And Lamech{H3929} lived{H2421} after{H310} he begat{H3205} Noah{H5146} five{H2568} hundred{H8141} ninety{H8673} and five{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Lamech{H3929} were seven{H7651} hundred{H8141} seventy{H7657} and seven{H7651} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}.
And Noah{H5146} was five{H2568} hundred{H3967} years{H8141} old{H1121}: and Noah{H5146} begat{H3205} Shem{H8035}, Ham{H2526}, and Japheth{H3315}.
